blocks.name: symgfix2
blocks.content: If a permutation does not move a certain element of a set to a second element, there is a third element which is moved to the second element. (Contributed by AV, 2-Jan-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm symgfix2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wcel(c2, cdif(c3, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c4), c0)))), wrex(s1, cdif(c1, csn(c4)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wcel(c2, cdif(c3, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c4), c0)))), wrex(s1, cdif(c1, csn(c4)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0)))), diffss(s0, s1))
  syl5bi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cdif(c3, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c4), c0)))), wrex(s1, cdif(c1, csn(c4)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wo(wn(wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0)))))
  bitri(wcel(c2, cdif(c3, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c4), c0)))), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wo(wn(wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0)))), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c4), c0))))))
  eldif(c2, c3, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c4), c0)))
  anbi2i(wcel(c2, c3), wn(wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c4), c0)))), wo(wn(wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0))))
  xchnxbir(wcel(c2, crab(s0, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c4), c0))), wo(wn(wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0))), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0)))
  ianor(wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0))
  elrab(s0, c2, c3, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c4), c0), wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0))
  eqeq1d(cfv(cv(s0), c4), c0, cfv(c2, c4), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  fveq1(cv(s0), c2, c4)
  impd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wo(wn(wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0))), wrex(s1, cdif(c1, csn(c4)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0)))
  com13(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wo(wn(wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0))), wrex(s1, cdif(c1, csn(c4)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0)))
  jaoi(wn(wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0)), wi(wcel(c2, c3), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s1, cdif(c1, csn(c4)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0)))))
  pm2.21(wcel(c2, c3), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s1, cdif(c1, csn(c4)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0))))
  syl5(wn(wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0)), wcel(c2, c3), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s1, cdif(c1, csn(c4)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0))), wral(hs0, c1, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))))
  symgmov2(hs0, s1, c2, c3, c1)
  com13(wn(wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0)), wral(hs0, c1, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s1, cdif(c1, csn(c4)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0)))
  ex(wcel(c0, c1), wral(hs0, c1, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))), wi(wn(wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0)), wrex(s1, cdif(c1, csn(c4)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0))))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(hs0, c1, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cv(hs0))))), wn(wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0)), wrex(s1, cdif(c1, csn(c4)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0)), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0)))
  rspcva(hs0, c0, c1, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cv(hs0))), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0)))
  rexbidv(s1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c0, cfv(c2, cv(s1)))
  syl6bbr(wn(wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0)), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0)), wrex(s1, cdif(c1, csn(c4)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0)), wrex(s1, c1, wa(wne(cv(s1), c4), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0))))
  rexbidv(s1, c1, wn(wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0), wa(wne(cv(s1), c4), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0)))
  pm4.71rd(wn(wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0), wne(cv(s1), c4))
  com12(wn(wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0), wne(cv(s1), c4))
  syl6bi(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0), wn(wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0)), wne(cv(s1), c4), wn(wceq(cfv(c2, c4), cfv(c2, cv(s1)))))
  notbid(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0), wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0), wceq(cfv(c2, c4), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))
  eqcoms(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0, wb(wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0), wceq(cfv(c2, c4), cfv(c2, cv(s1)))))
  eqeq2(c0, cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c2, c4))
  necon3bi(cv(s1), c4, wceq(cfv(c2, c4), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))
  eqcoms(cv(s1), c4, wceq(cfv(c2, c4), cfv(c2, cv(s1))))
  fveq2(c4, cv(s1), c2)
  rexdifsn(s1, c1, c4, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cfv(c2, c4), c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wn.s(s1, wceq(cfv(c2, c4), c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cfv(c2, c4), c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm symgfix2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(c3 \ { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c4)= c0 })‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { c4 }),(c2 ` s1)= c0)))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base `(SymGrp ` c1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(c3 \ { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c4)= c0 })‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { c4 }),(c2 ` s1)= c0))), d(s0, s1))
  syl5bi(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà(c3 \ { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c4)= c0 }), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { c4 }),(c2 ` s1)= c0), (c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß(¬¨ c2 ‚àà c3 ‚à® ¬¨(c2 ` c4)= c0)))
  bitri(c2 ‚àà(c3 \ { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c4)= c0 }), (c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß(¬¨ c2 ‚àà c3 ‚à® ¬¨(c2 ` c4)= c0)), (c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß ¬¨ c2 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c4)= c0 }))
  eldif(c2, c3, { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c4)= c0 })
  anbi2i(c2 ‚àà c3, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c4)= c0 }, (¬¨ c2 ‚àà c3 ‚à® ¬¨(c2 ` c4)= c0))
  xchnxbir(c2 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà c3 |(s0 ` c4)= c0 }, (¬¨ c2 ‚àà c3 ‚à® ¬¨(c2 ` c4)= c0), (c2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß(c2 ` c4)= c0))
  ianor(c2 ‚àà c3, (c2 ` c4)= c0)
  elrab(s0, c2, c3, (s0 ` c4)= c0, (c2 ` c4)= c0)
  eqeq1d((s0 ` c4), c0, (c2 ` c4), s0 = c2)
  fveq1(s0, c2, c4)
  impd(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (¬¨ c2 ‚àà c3 ‚à® ¬¨(c2 ` c4)= c0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { c4 }),(c2 ` s1)= c0))
  com13(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (¬¨ c2 ‚àà c3 ‚à® ¬¨(c2 ` c4)= c0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { c4 }),(c2 ` s1)= c0))
  jaoi(¬¨ c2 ‚àà c3, ¬¨(c2 ` c4)= c0, (c2 ‚àà c3 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { c4 }),(c2 ` s1)= c0))))
  pm2.21(c2 ‚àà c3, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { c4 }),(c2 ` s1)= c0)))
  syl5(¬¨(c2 ` c4)= c0, c2 ‚àà c3, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { c4 }),(c2 ` s1)= c0)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(c2 ` s1)= hs0)))
  symgmov2(hs0, s1, c2, c3, c1)
  com13(¬¨(c2 ` c4)= c0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(c2 ` s1)= hs0)), c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { c4 }),(c2 ` s1)= c0))
  ex(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(c2 ` s1)= hs0)), (¬¨(c2 ` c4)= c0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { c4 }),(c2 ` s1)= c0)))
  syl5ibcom((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(c2 ` s1)= hs0))), ¬¨(c2 ` c4)= c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { c4 }),(c2 ` s1)= c0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(c2 ` s1)= c0))
  rspcva(hs0, c0, c1, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(c2 ` s1)= hs0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(c2 ` s1)= c0))
  rexbidv(s1, c1, hs0 = c0, (c2 ` s1)= hs0, (c2 ` s1)= c0)
  eqeq2(hs0, c0, (c2 ` s1))
  syl6bbr(¬¨(c2 ` c4)= c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(c2 ` s1)= c0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(c1 \ { c4 }),(c2 ` s1)= c0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(s1 ‚â† c4 ‚àß(c2 ` s1)= c0)))
  rexbidv(s1, c1, ¬¨(c2 ` c4)= c0, (c2 ` s1)= c0, (s1 ‚â† c4 ‚àß(c2 ` s1)= c0))
  pm4.71rd(¬¨(c2 ` c4)= c0, (c2 ` s1)= c0, s1 ‚â† c4)
  com12(¬¨(c2 ` c4)= c0, (c2 ` s1)= c0, s1 ‚â† c4)
  syl6bi((c2 ` s1)= c0, ¬¨(c2 ` c4)= c0, s1 ‚â† c4, ¬¨(c2 ` c4)=(c2 ` s1))
  notbid((c2 ` s1)= c0, (c2 ` c4)= c0, (c2 ` c4)=(c2 ` s1))
  eqcoms((c2 ` s1), c0, ((c2 ` c4)= c0 ‚Üî(c2 ` c4)=(c2 ` s1)))
  eqeq2(c0, (c2 ` s1), (c2 ` c4))
  necon3bi(s1, c4, (c2 ` c4)=(c2 ` s1))
  eqcoms(s1, c4, (c2 ` c4)=(c2 ` s1))
  fveq2(c4, s1, c2)
  rexdifsn(s1, c1, c4, (c2 ` s1)= c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (c2 ` c4), c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1,(c2 ` s1)= c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wn.s(s1, (c2 ` c4)= c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, (c2 ` c4), c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, c4)
}

blocks.name: symgextf
blocks.content: The extension of a permutation, fixing the additional element, is a function. (Contributed by AV, 6-Jan-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm symgextf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wf(c4, c1, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cdif(c1, csn(c0)))))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c1, cif(c0, cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  fmptd(s0, c4, c1, c1, cif(c0, cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  ifclda(c0, cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  simplll(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eldifad(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1, csn(c0), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cdif(c1, csn(c0))), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, csn(c0))))
  simpllr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, csn(c0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c0)))
  anim12i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c0))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  neqne(cv(s0), c0)
  eldifsn(cv(s0), c1, c0)
  symgfv(c2, c3, cv(s0), cdif(c1, csn(c0)), cfv(csymg, cdif(c1, csn(c0))))
  eqid(cfv(csymg, cdif(c1, csn(c0))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm symgextf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c4 : c1 ‚Üí c1))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base `(SymGrp `(c1 \ { c0 })))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 = c0, c0,(c2 ` s0)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  fmptd(s0, c4, c1, c1, if(s0 = c0, c0,(c2 ` s0)), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  ifclda(c0, (c2 ` s0), c1, ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß s0 ‚àà c1), s0 = c0)
  simplll(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, s0 ‚àà c1, s0 = c0)
  eldifad((c2 ` s0), c1, { c0 }, (((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚àß ¬¨ s0 = c0))
  syl2anc((((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚àß ¬¨ s0 = c0), (c2 ` s0)‚àà(c1 \ { c0 }), c2 ‚àà c3, s0 ‚àà(c1 \ { c0 }))
  simpllr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, s0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ s0 = c0)
  sylibr((((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚àß ¬¨ s0 = c0), s0 ‚àà(c1 \ { c0 }), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚â† c0))
  anim12i(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚àß s0 ‚àà c1), ¬¨ s0 = c0, s0 ‚àà c1, s0 ‚â† c0)
  simpr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), s0 ‚àà c1)
  neqne(s0, c0)
  eldifsn(s0, c1, c0)
  symgfv(c2, c3, s0, (c1 \ { c0 }), (SymGrp `(c1 \ { c0 })))
  eqid((SymGrp `(c1 \ { c0 })))
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: symgextfv
blocks.content: The function value of the extension of a permutation, fixing the additional element, for elements in the original domain. (Contributed by AV, 6-Jan-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm symgextfv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wcel(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c0))), wceq(cfv(c5, c4), cfv(c2, c4))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cdif(c1, csn(c0)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cmpt(s0, c1, cif(c0, cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wcel(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c0))), wceq(cfv(c5, c4), cfv(c2, c4)))), wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cdif(c1, csn(c0))))))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wcel(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c0))), wceq(cfv(c5, c4), cfv(c2, c4)))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, cdif(c1, csn(c0))), wceq(cfv(c5, c4), cfv(c2, c4)))

blocks.name: gsmsymgrfix
blocks.content: The composition of permutations fixing one element also fixes this element. (Contributed by AV, 20-Jan-2019.)

blocks.name: fvcosymgeq
blocks.content: The values of two compositions of permutations are equal if the values of the composed permutations are pairwise equal. (Contributed by AV, 26-Jan-2019.)

blocks.name: gsmsymgreq
blocks.content: Two combination of permutations moves an element of the intersection of the base sets of the permutations to the same element if each pair of corresponding permutations moves such an element to the same element. (Contributed by AV, 20-Jan-2019.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: symgfixelq
blocks.content: A permutation of a set fixing an element of the set. (Contributed by AV, 4-Jan-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm symgfixelq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, c2), wa(wf1o(c0, c3, c3), wceq(cfv(c0, c4), c4))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, crab(s0, c5, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c4), c4)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2), wa(wf1o(c0, c3, c3), wceq(cfv(c0, c4), c4)), wa(wcel(c0, c5), wceq(cfv(c0, c4), c4)))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, c2, c5, wceq(cfv(c0, c4), c4), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), c4), c4))
  eqeq1d(cfv(cv(hs0), c4), c4, cfv(c0, c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, c4)
  eqtri(c2, crab(hs0, c5, wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), c4), c4)), crab(s0, c5, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c4), c4)))
  cbvrabv(s0, hs0, c5, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c4), c4), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), c4), c4))
  eqeq1d(cfv(cv(s0), c4), c4, cfv(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fveq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c4)
  anbi1d(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c5), wceq(cfv(c0, c4), c4), wf1o(c0, c3, c3))
  elsymgbas2(c0, c1, c5, c3, cfv(csymg, c3))
  eqid(cfv(csymg, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)

blocks.name: symgfixels
blocks.content: The restriction of a permutation to a set with one element removed is an element of the restricted symmetric group if the restriction is a 1-1 onto function. (Contributed by AV, 4-Jan-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm symgfixels(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cres(c0, c2), c3), wf1o(cres(c0, c2), c2, c2)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, c5)))
  -| wceq(c6, crab(s0, c4, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c7), c7)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cdif(c5, csn(c7)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cdif(c5, csn(c7)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cres(c0, c2), c3), wf1o(cres(c0, c2), c2, c2))), wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, c5))))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cres(c0, c2), c3), wf1o(cres(c0, c2), c2, c2))), wceq(c6, crab(s0, c4, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), c7), c7))))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cres(c0, c2), c3), wf1o(cres(c0, c2), c2, c2))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cres(c0, c2), c3), wf1o(cres(c0, c2), c2, c2))), diffsc(s0, c7))
  3bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cres(c0, c2), c3), wf1o(cres(c0, c2), c2, c2), wcel(cres(c0, c2), cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cdif(c5, csn(c7))))), wf1o(cres(c0, c2), cdif(c5, csn(c7)), cdif(c5, csn(c7))))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cres(c0, c2), c3), wcel(cres(c0, c2), cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cdif(c5, csn(c7)))))))
  eleq2i(cres(c0, c2), c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cdif(c5, csn(c7)))))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cres(c0, c2), cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cdif(c5, csn(c7))))), wf1o(cres(c0, c2), cdif(c5, csn(c7)), cdif(c5, csn(c7)))), wcel(cres(c0, c2), universe))
  resexg(c0, c1, c2)
  elsymgbas2(cres(c0, c2), universe, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cdif(c5, csn(c7)))), cdif(c5, csn(c7)), cfv(csymg, cdif(c5, csn(c7))))
  eqid(cfv(csymg, cdif(c5, csn(c7))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cdif(c5, csn(c7)))))
  f1oeq123d(cres(c0, c2), cdif(c5, csn(c7)), cdif(c5, csn(c7)), cres(c0, c2), c2, c2, wcel(c0, c1))
  eqidd(cres(c0, c2), wcel(c0, c1))
  eqcomd(cdif(c5, csn(c7)), c2, wcel(c0, c1))

blocks.name: symgfixf1o
blocks.content: The mapping of a permutation of a set fixing an element to a permutation of the set without the fixed element is a bijection. (Contributed by AV, 7-Jan-2019.)
